pkgmetadata.longdescription: # whatimagePython library to detect image type from a few bytes, focussed on webby formats (old and new)Currently supports:- JPEG- WEBP- GIF- PNG- HEIC- AVIF- BMP- TIFF- PGM/PGM/PPM## Installation```pip install whatimage```## Usage```pythonimport whatimagewith open('image.jpg', 'rb') as f: data = f.read()fmt = whatimage.identify_image(data)print(fmt)```> 'jpeg'
